src:
Norskt fartyg kapat av pirater – nio personer kidnappade
Ett fartyg som ägs av det norska rederiet JJ Ugland har bordats av pirater utanför Benin i Västafrika. ”Vårt bulklastfartyg MV Bonita bordades av pirater tidigt i lördags morse när hon låg förankrad utanför Cotonou i Benin”, skriver rederiet på sin hemsida.
03 Nov 2019, 21:01 by TT

text:
Norwegian ship hijacked by pirates - nine people kidnapped
A ship owned by the Norwegian shipping company JJ Ugland has been boarded by pirates outside Benin in West Africa. "Our bulk cargo ship MV Bonita was boarded by pirates early Saturday morning when she was anchored off Cotonou in Benin," the shipping company writes on its website.
03 Nov 2019, 21:01 by TT
